revised_title: Obituary of Dr. Parkinson: A Pioneering Mathematician and Educator
tldr: This obituary highlights the life and achievements of Dr. Parkinson, a prominent mathematician and educator at Cambridge University. He was a successful tutor, examiner, and moderator, and his textbooks on elementary mechanics and optics were widely used. Dr. Parkinson also played an active role in university affairs, serving on various committees and boards throughout his career.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Biographies and Book Reviews
